div.class: kzv0b81_667 kzv0b86e_667 kzv0b87s_667 kzv0b89s_667 kzv0b8ag_667 kzv0b81ew_667 kzv0b81fv_667 kzv0b81yc_667 l5osrp3s_667 l5osrp9_667 l5osrpx_667 l5osrp27_667 l5osrp2u_667 l5osrp3t_667

h2.title: [object Object]
h2.span: Luken All Weather Wicker/Rattan 2 - Person Seating Group with Cushions

div.p: Rated 4.5 out of 5 stars. 2527 total votes
Get it by Thu. Sep 22

Enjoy cocktails with a friend in your backyard, or watch the sunset with your loved one from the front patio with this inviting conversation set. A contemporary update on classic designs, these three pieces showcase clean-lined steel frames wrapped in synthetic woven rattan. The two armchairs are topped with polyester-wrapped pillows (available in a variety of color options) and feature a low back. The table measures 17'' h x 16'' w x 16'' d and can fit into smaller spaces.

ul.li: Seating Outer Frame Material: Resin (All Weather) Wicker/Rattan
Frame Durability: Rust Resistant; Weather Resistant

div.p: I love this club set…especially for the price. It’s well-constructed and easy to assemble. The only drawback I would say is the chair backs are a little too low and the chairs are a little too deep. The cushions are a bit thin but I love the colour…so rich! The chairs are quite comfortable and the table is very cute! I would definitely recommend this set!. Lisa. Sutton West, ON. 2018-06-03 17:35:04

div.class: kzv0b81_667 kzv0b86e_667 kzv0b87s_667 kzv0b89s_667 kzv0b8ag_667 kzv0b81ew_667 kzv0b81fv_667 kzv0b81yc_667 l5osrp3s_667 l5osrp9_667 l5osrpx_667 l5osrp27_667 l5osrp2u_667 l5osrp3t_667

h2.title: [object Object]
h2.span: Polyethylene (PE) Wicker 2 - Person Seating Group with Cushions

div.p: Rated 4.5 out of 5 stars. 74 total votes
Free shipping

The outdoor conversation set is ideal for a small balcony, deck, backyard, porch, poolside, and any other outdoor décor, can be combined with other patio furniture sets to create an outdoor living space perfectly suited to your needs so you can relax in delight.

ul.li: Frame Durability: UV Resistant; Rust Resistant; Weather Resistant
Chair Seat Height – Floor to Seat: 13.5''

div.p: We love this set so much! It is very elegant and extremely comfortable. The price is quite nice. The back of chairs are really support your back even without a cushion. The table is a nice size for a plant or small decoration plus some drinks or a couple of small plates. The chairs are also bigger than I was expected and actually looks very nice to the point that I've gotten many compliments on the set. It is very easy to assemble it.Only takes about 5 minutes.Highly recommend it to everyone who wants a simple but elegant patio set.. DZ. Hacienda heights, CA. 2021-11-11 22:44:38

div.class: kzv0b81_667 kzv0b86e_667 kzv0b87u_667 kzv0b89s_667 kzv0b8ag_667 kzv0b81ew_667 kzv0b81fv_667 kzv0b81yc_667 l5osrp3s_667 l5osrp9_667 l5osrpx_667 l5osrp27_667 l5osrp2u_667 l5osrp3t_667

h2.title: [object Object]
h2.span: Kissner Polyethylene (PE) Wicker 4 - Person Seating Group

div.p: Rated 4.5 out of 5 stars. 3 total votes
Free shipping
4 pieces outdoor patio furniture set, with 2 single chairs, 1 double chair, and 1 coffee table. It’s an excellent lounging choice for patio, porch, poolside, or garden area use.

ul.li: Seating Outer Frame Material: Wicker/Rattan; Metal
Frame Durability: UV Resistant; Rust Resistant; Weather Resistant; Water Resistant; Mildew Resistant

div.class: kzv0b81_667 kzv0b86e_667 kzv0b87u_667 kzv0b89u_667 kzv0b8ag_667 kzv0b81ew_667 kzv0b81fv_667 kzv0b81yc_667 l5osrp3s_667 l5osrp9_667 l5osrpx_667 l5osrp27_667 l5osrp2u_667 l5osrp3t_667

h2.title: [object Object]
h2.span: Arlington Polyethylene (PE) Wicker 4 - Person Seating Group with Cushions

div.p: Rated 4.5 out of 5 stars. 733 total votes
Free shipping

This 3-piece outdoor sectional set is the perfect companion to a summer barbecue – other than good friends to enjoy it with, of course. It includes a deep seating sofa, a cushioned ottoman with storage, and a coffee table. All this patio furniture is crafted from rust-resistant steel wrapped in two-tone, dark resin wicker. The outdoor seating is topped with quick-dry, water- and fade-resistant cushions in your choice of colors. The storage ottoman gives you a handy spot to keep the couch cushions when you're not using them.

div.class: kzv0b81_667 kzv0b86e_667 kzv0b87u_667 kzv0b89u_667 kzv0b8ai_667 kzv0b81ew_667 kzv0b81fv_667 kzv0b81yc_667 l5osrp3s_667 l5osrp9_667 l5osrpx_667 l5osrp27_667 l5osrp2u_667 l5osrp3t_667

h2.title: [object Object]
h2.span: Luken 4 - Person Seating Group with Cushions

div.p: Rated 4 out of 5 stars. 586 total votes
Get it by Thu. Sep 22

Give a petite patio a comfortable touch with this four-piece conversation set. Sized for modest city balconies and small-scale decks, it adds seating for smaller spaces. Made from a steel frame and a woven synthetic rattan construction, these weather-resistant pieces were built to live outdoors. Its cream poly-blend cushions contrast with the dark rattan for aesthetic appeal. Two chairs, one loveseat, and a glass-topped table are included. Assembly is required.

ul.li: Frame Durability: UV Resistant; Rust Resistant; Weather Resistant; Water Resistant
Chair Seat Height – Floor to Seat: 14''

div.p: The set looks exactly like the picture. The cushions are pretty comfortable and easy to clean. It wasn’t very difficult to assemble.. Ashley. Leamington, ON. 2018-05-16 14:25:59

div.class: kzv0b81_667 kzv0b86e_667 kzv0b87u_667 kzv0b89u_667 kzv0b8ai_667 kzv0b81ew_667 kzv0b81fv_667 kzv0b81yc_667 l5osrp3s_667 l5osrp9_667 l5osrpx_667 l5osrp27_667 l5osrp2u_667 l5osrp3t_667

h2.title: [object Object]
h2.span: Arlington Polyethylene (PE) Wicker 7 - Person Seating Group with Cushions

div.p: Rated 4.5 out of 5 stars. 1557 total votes
Free shipping

This 5-piece outdoor conversation set is the perfect companion to a summer barbecue – other than good friends to enjoy it with, of course. It includes a sofa, a loveseat, two club chairs, and a coffee table with storage. This set is crafted from rust-resistant steel wrapped in resin wicker with a two-tone weave. Each deep piece of seating is topped with water and fade-resistant cushions with machine-washable zip covers. Plus, the coffee table's lid lifts up, giving you a handy spot to keep the couch cushions when you're not using them. This sofa seating group comes backed by a one-year warranty.

ul.li: Frame Durability: Weather Resistant; Water Resistant
Chair Seat Height – Floor to Seat: 15''

div.p: This looks just like pictured. The seats are pretty comfortable, the cushions are deep and water resistant. The assembly took a while because there were SO many pieces to put together, but overall it was not a hassle. All parts and screws were provided and clear instructions. The table can hold storage. It does not have a glass top.. Anonymous. Bayside, NY. 2019-06-17 17:52:20

div.class: kzv0b81_667 kzv0b86e_667 kzv0b87u_667 kzv0b89u_667 kzv0b8ai_667 kzv0b81ew_667 kzv0b81fv_667 kzv0b81yc_667 l5osrp3s_667 l5osrp9_667 l5osrpx_667 l5osrp27_667 l5osrp2u_667 l5osrp3t_667

h2.title: [object Object]
h2.span: Kirts 4 - Person Seating Group with Cushions

div.p: Rated 4 out of 5 stars. 1330 total votes
Get it by Fri. Sep 23

Create an instant gathering spot on your porch or patio with this classic 4-person seating group. This set includes two armchairs, one loveseat, and one coffee table. All pieces are made of water-resistant brown resin rattan. The chairs and loveseat have gently curved full-backs and slatted arms. Each has a seat cushion filled with foam and upholstered in a polyester blend. The cushion covers have zipper closures, so they’re easy to remove for spot cleaning. The 32” long and 19” deep table features a glass top and offers plenty of room for seating and entertaining. Plus, it has a lower shelf that’s great for storing spare blankets or displaying favorite decorative items.

ul.li: Seating Outer Frame Material: Wicker/Rattan; Metal

div.p: Beautiful set for a good value! Deep seats, but shorter backrest - depends on your needs (I am 5’1” and I can cross my legs on the chair and I don’t need the backrest to be very high). Great size for a condo balcony or small patio. Sturdy and much better quality than I expected. My boyfriend assembled all 4 pieces in about 2 hours. He did say that some of the pieces don’t align up properly but was able to make it all fit in the end. The screws came in a ripped plastic bag and were all over the box - We were missing a screw but I had a different one at home that was about the same size and it worked. I’d recommend this for the sale price.. Grace. Etobicoke, ON. 2019-08-16 09:19:38

div.class: kzv0b81_667 kzv0b86e_667 kzv0b87u_667 kzv0b89u_667 kzv0b8ai_667 kzv0b81ew_667 kzv0b81fv_667 kzv0b81yc_667 l5osrp3s_667 l5osrp9_667 l5osrpx_667 l5osrp27_667 l5osrp2u_667 l5osrp3t_667

div.p: Rated 4.5 out of 5 stars. 38 total votes
Free shipping

With a bohemian aesthetic, this outdoor conversation set will accentuate your tastes enough to make your home more attractive and distinctive. Resilient and tough PE rattan provides a colorful and stylish appearance with stability and durability. The oval-shaped opening beckons you to sink in and enjoy the comfort of being wrapped. All you have to do to assemble is screw the legs on. The chairs are very comfortable, with a slightly reclined posture.Lounge in the comfort of your home or on the patio on a warm and sunny day and add some fresh and eye-catchingpillows for a style punch.

ul.li: For longevity: Care should be taken to protect from long periods of direct sunlight and wet weather.

div.p: I absolutely love the design and the chairs are super comfy! It was super easy to put together, too. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is because the chairs are a bit wobbly (not too bad though) and the glass that goes on top of the table isn't super secure. But overall I'm very happy with my purchase!. Melle. Saint Paul, MN. 2022-04-28 18:39:33

div.class: kzv0b81_667 kzv0b86e_667 kzv0b87u_667 kzv0b89u_667 kzv0b8ai_667 kzv0b81ew_667 kzv0b81fv_667 kzv0b81yc_667 l5osrp3s_667 l5osrp9_667 l5osrpx_667 l5osrp27_667 l5osrp2u_667 l5osrp3t_667

h2.title: [object Object]
h2.span: Aibhlinn Metal 4 - Person Seating Group with Cushions

div.p: Rated 4 out of 5 stars. 31 total votes
Free shipping

Boasting modern shapes and classic comfort, Our PVC-coated polyester Conversation Set checks all the boxes. With two chairs, a cozy love seat (or double chair) and table, this set is the perfect place to hang out with the family and enjoy long chats and lively conversation.Both lightweight and sturdy, it’ll hold up to all kinds of weather and hijinks.

ul.li: The zippered seat cushion filled with sponge, strong rebound, good comfort and antibacterial.
The thickened pipe is greatly improved in bearing capacity and stability.

div.class: kzv0b81_667 kzv0b86e_667 kzv0b87u_667 kzv0b89u_667 kzv0b8ai_667 kzv0b81ew_667 kzv0b81fv_667 kzv0b81yc_667 l5osrp3s_667 l5osrp9_667 l5osrpx_667 l5osrp27_667 l5osrp2u_667 l5osrp3t_667

h2.title: [object Object]
h2.span: Alegna Polyethylene (PE) Wicker 2 - Person Seating Group with Cushions

div.p: Rated 4.5 out of 5 stars. 42 total votes
Free shipping

1.High Quality Material:Made of high quality PE rattan and Iron frame, stable, sturdy and durable, all-weather resistant synthetic resin is built to last while having a sleek and stylish finish. Our wicker is strong and durable but also lightweight at the same time. Breathable seat cushions for optimal comfort and relaxation2.Excellent Design: Modern and stylish design outdoor sofa set fits perfectly with any indoor or outdoor décor, even for sunroom or pool is suitable.3.Easy to Clean:Fade-resistant cushions for easy to rinse. Simply zip off the machine washable cushion covers and give them a quick wash to have them looking brand new.4.Warm Prompt:Please confirm the product size before purchasing, to make sure the size of our product is in line with your requirements

ul.li: Frame Durability: Year Round Use; UV Resistant; Weather Resistant
Chair Seat Height – Floor to Seat: 14.17''

div.p: Love these chairs! These are really comfortable. The color matches with another set I purchased. They were really easy to out together and shipping was faster than expected. Im really happy with this purchase!. Bertha. Grand Prairie, TX. 2021-03-29 23:50:25

div.class: kzv0b81_667 kzv0b86e_667 kzv0b87u_667 kzv0b89u_667 kzv0b8ai_667 kzv0b81ew_667 kzv0b81fv_667 kzv0b81yc_667 l5osrp3s_667 l5osrp9_667 l5osrpx_667 l5osrp27_667 l5osrp2u_667 l5osrp3t_667

h2.title: [object Object]
h2.span: Giblin Polyethylene (PE) Wicker Seating Group with Cushions

div.p: Rated 5 out of 5 stars. 62 total votes
Free shipping

Transform your garden into a personal oasis with this exquisite patio conversation set which will bring a classic yet stylish charm to your outdoor living space. Each piece in the set is made of durable UV-resistant beige wicker wrapping around the rust-resistant steel frame, building a sturdy and solid construction to support the accompany with you years after years. Chairs feature a curved back and arm with deep cushioned seats providing optimal comfort. The delicate coffee table included gives you a handy spot to place drinks or snacks. Designed in modern style in elaborate craft, this cute set is sure to be a hit in outdoor collections. Be ready to kick back and relax in the summer with this elegant furniture set.

ul.li: Seating Outer Frame Material: Wicker/Rattan; Metal
Frame Durability: UV Resistant; Rust Resistant; Weather Resistant; Water Resistant; Mildew Resistant
Chair Seat Height – Floor to Seat: 16.4''

div.p: I received the set which was carefully packaged. There was not any damage to the furniture. The first thing I noticed was that the chairs and table are essentially the same as depicted online. The chairs are very sturdy as is the table and I feel that they will support the weight of the person or products that I put on top of it. While it was easy to assemble, one of the chairs has a defective leg. That is, the leg does not reach to the floor. I readjusted the leg several times, however it did not correct the issue. The chair therefore is wobbly. One main concern that I have is the labels that are affixed to the legs are impossible to remove without using some type of adhesive remover or scraping it. Scraping it would cause scratches to be on the legs so I will opt not to use that method. Using alcohol or some type of adhesive removal is going to be time consuming. In the future, manufacturers should use easy to peel labels as not to mar the furniture or cause extra work for customers. Overall, I look forward to using the set on my patio.. Linda. Takoma Park, MD. 2021-08-21 13:49:35

div.class: kzv0b81_667 kzv0b86e_667 kzv0b87u_667 kzv0b89u_667 kzv0b8ai_667 kzv0b81ew_667 kzv0b81fv_667 kzv0b81yc_667 l5osrp3s_667 l5osrp9_667 l5osrpx_667 l5osrp27_667 l5osrp2u_667 l5osrp3t_667

h2.title: [object Object]
h2.span: Chemaine Polyethylene (PE) Wicker 6 - Person Seating Group with Cushions

div.p: Rated 4 out of 5 stars. 4 total votes
Free shipping

The solid metal structure makes it super safe to sit in the sofa set. Added bars for the frame enhance the sturdiness. PE Wicker is strong enough to survive inclement weather and guarantees the set has a long service life. Note: cushions are not water-proof; (When you don't use them, advise you to take cushions inside or buy a cover for longer service time). Suitable for everyone who needs great comfort. Also suitable for different scenes like poolside, backyard, garden, patio, etc. This sofa set includes six sofas and can be put into different configurations. You can put all of them together to make a sofa with a long chaise or choose to put them separately for more people to sit in based on your own demands.

ul.li: Frame Durability: UV Resistant; Weather Resistant
Chair Seat Height – Floor to Seat: 24.4''

div.p: Very nice for the price. Cushions are pretty stiff. Good value.. Jo. Plant City, FL. 2021-09-26 16:19:00
